Text: RE Market Intelligence ResourcesFriday works for my schedule I need the attachment thanks Original Message From Brennan Lorna Sent Wednesday January AM To McGowan Loretta Lokay Michelle Wadle Susan Subject Market Intelligence Resources I would like to have a short touch base meeting with all of you or your designees to share information on our current industrycompany resources that we use for market intelligence purposes As you know we are working on moving into the Dynegy environment and I would like to pass on to you my information and any contacts that you may need in the future in dealing with vendors or internal publication representatives I have reserved Room Video in Omaha and C Video in Houston on Friday January at pm for a minute exchange of information If you cannot attend please give me a call Attached is a listing of corporate resources that Northern Natural Gas Company was using over the past year We can use this for part of our discussion Bring any questions that you may have Lorna M Brennan Competitive Intelligence Enron Transportation Services Omaha
